metadata.title: CVE-2023-5726 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description: A website could have obscured the full screen notification by using thefile open dialog. This could have led to user confusion and possiblespoofing attacks. *Note: This issue only affected macOS operating systems.Other operating systems are unaffected.* This vulnerability affects Firefox< 119, Firefox ESR < 115.4, and Thunderbird < 115.4.1.

criterions.comment: firefox package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs78 package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs102 package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
